api_list.name: Futures Odds
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a list of futures odds for a given event.

required_parameters.name: event_id
required_parameters.description: Event to include. Get a list of event IDs from futures/events endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Set the state to show sportsbooks solely from. Will show nationwide sportsbooks if omitted.

optional_parameters.name: date_format
optional_parameters.description: Set date format to UNIX Timestamp or ISO. Defaults to UNIX if omitted.

api_list.name: Futures Events
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a list of futures events.

required_parameters.name: league
required_parameters.description: League to include, such as NBA, NFL etc.

optional_parameters.name: date_format
optional_parameters.description: Set date format to UNIX Timestamp or ISO. Defaults to UNIX if omitted.

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a list of odds for a given game.

required_parameters.name: event_id
required_parameters.description: The Event ID to show. Get event IDs from the events endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Set the state to show sportsbooks solely from. Will show nationwide sportsbooks if omitted.

optional_parameters.name: markets
optional_parameters.description:
Markets to show. For example, money for moneyline. If not set, all markets will be shown.

Value can be playerprops to only show player props if sport allows. This option can only be used on its own.

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a list of games, in date order.

required_parameters.name: league
required_parameters.description: League to include, such as NBA, NFL etc.

optional_parameters.name: date_format
optional_parameters.description: Set date format to UNIX Timestamp or ISO. Defaults to UNIX if omitted.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of events shown.

api_list.name: Markets
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all available market types (for example money line, spread, first-quarter total).

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: Sport to include, such as basketball, football.
